review: I really love the Amazon Fire TV stick. I had connection issues with my Chromecast because supposedly it was too far away from my WIFI router (it was a whole room away), and I made the switch. The Fire TV stick runs so much faster, and the remote makes it much easier to control. It is certainly biased towards Prime, but the other apps Netflix and Hulu work perfectly well. Highly recommend this product if you're looking for an affordable streaming option.
